subject: refactor(conventions): make conventions static and read-only
body:
Conventions are now static text per import format (JSON, Markdown),
not user-editable. Users select a format tab, read the rules, and
copy them into an AI prompt alongside raw data.

Convention content lives in src/data/conventions.ts as constants
derived from the actual import service specs. The ConventionsModal
no longer uses useConventions hook or IndexedDB persistence.

Previous editable textarea replaced with a read-only <pre> display
with format selector tabs and copy-to-clipboard button.

Tags: conventions, ui, data
